caption.p: Guidance document on appropriate management of suspect/confirmed cases of COVID-19

td.p: Hostel, hotel, school, lodge, etc. Separate rooms for suspected and non-COVID-19 patients
Temperature, respiration, oxygen level and other symptoms
Mild and very mild cases and COVID-19 suspected cases: treatment
Doctors, nurses with makeshift personal protective equipment (PPE)
Suspected cases with moderate symptoms: treatment
Symptoms worsen from moderate to severe: transfer the patient to DCH
Doctors and nurses/attendants with makeshift PPE
Intensive care unit with ventilators/beds with assured oxygen supply

table-wrap-foot.p: Source: Ministry of Health and Family Welfare 2020 Government of India
